verses.verse: And <S%G1161><s%> it came to pass <S%G1096><s%>, that, while Apollos <S%G625><s%> was <S%G1511><s%> <S%G1722><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> Corinth <S%G2882><s%>, Paul <S%G3972><s%> having passed <S%G1330><s%> through the upper <S%G510><s%> coasts <S%G3313><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Ephesus <S%G2181><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> finding <S%G2147><s%> certain <S%G5100><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%>,

He said <S%G2036><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> them <S%G846><s%> <S%G1487><s%>, Have ye received <S%G2983><s%> the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost <S%G4151><s%> since ye believed <S%G4100><s%>? And <S%G1161><s%> they said <S%G2036><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> him <S%G846><s%> <S%G235><s%>, We have <S%G191><s%> not so much as <S%G3761><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> whether <S%G1487><s%> there be any <S%G2076><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost <S%G4151><s%>.

And <S%G5037><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, Unto <S%G1519><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> were ye baptized <S%G907><s%>? And <S%G1161><s%> they said <S%G2036><s%>, Unto <S%G1519><s%> John's <S%G2491><s%> baptism <S%G908><s%>.

Then <S%G1161><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%>, John <S%G2491><s%> verily <S%G3303><s%> baptized <S%G907><s%> with the baptism <S%G908><s%> of repentance <S%G3341><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%> unto the people <S%G2992><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> they should believe <S%G4100><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> him which should come <S%G2064><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, that is <S%G5123><s%>, on <S%G1519><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>.
When <S%G1161><s%> they heard <S%G191><s%> this, they were baptized <S%G907><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> the name <S%G3686><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> when Paul <S%G3972><s%> had laid <S%G2007><s%> his hands <S%G5495><s%> upon <S%G2007><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost <S%G4151><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> them <S%G846><s%>; and <S%G5037><s%> they spake <S%G2980><s%> with tongues <S%G1100><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> prophesied <S%G4395><s%>.
And <S%G1161><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the men <S%G435><s%> were <S%G2258><s%> about <S%G5616><s%> twelve <S%G1177><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> he went <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the synagogue <S%G4864><s%>, and spake boldly <S%G3955><s%> for the space <S%G1909><s%> of three <S%G5140><s%> months <S%G3376><s%>, disputing <S%G1256><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> persuading <S%G3982><s%> the things concerning <S%G4012><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G5613><s%> divers <S%G5100><s%> were hardened <S%G4645><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> believed not <S%G544><s%>, but spake evil <S%G2551><s%> of that way <S%G3598><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> the multitude <S%G4128><s%>, he departed <S%G868><s%> from <S%G575><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, and separated <S%G873><s%> the disciples <S%G3101><s%>, disputing <S%G1256><s%> daily <S%G2596><s%> <S%G2250><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the school <S%G4981><s%> of one <S%G5100><s%> Tyrannus <S%G5181><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> continued <S%G1096><s%> by the space <S%G1909><s%> of two <S%G1417><s%> years <S%G2094><s%>; so <S%G5620><s%> that all <S%G3956><s%> they which dwelt in <S%G2730><s%> Asia <S%G773><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>, both <S%G5037><s%> Jews <S%G2453><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Greeks <S%G1672><s%>.
And <S%G5037><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> wrought <S%G4160><s%> special <S%G3756><s%> <S%G5177><s%> miracles <S%G1411><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the hands <S%G5495><s%> of Paul <S%G3972><s%>:

So <S%G2532><s%> <S%G5620><s%> that from <S%G575><s%> his <S%G846><s%> body <S%G5559><s%> were brought <S%G2018><s%> unto <S%G1909><s%> the sick <S%G770><s%> handkerchiefs <S%G4676><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> aprons <S%G4612><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the diseases <S%G3554><s%> departed <S%G525><s%> from <S%G575><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G5037><s%> the evil <S%G4190><s%> spirits <S%G4151><s%> went <S%G1831><s%> out of <S%G575><s%> them <S%G846><s%>.

¶ Then <S%G1161><s%> certain <S%G5100><s%> of <S%G575><s%> the vagabond <S%G4022><s%> Jews <S%G2453><s%>, exorcists <S%G1845><s%>, took upon them <S%G2021><s%> to call <S%G3687><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> them which had <S%G2192><s%> evil <S%G4190><s%> spirits <S%G4151><s%> the name <S%G3686><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, We adjure <S%G3726><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> by Jesus <S%G2424><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> preacheth <S%G2784><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> there were <S%G2258><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> sons <S%G5207><s%> of one Sceva <S%G4630><s%> <S%G5100><s%>, a Jew <S%G2453><s%>, and chief of the priests <S%G749><s%>, which did <S%G4160><s%> so <S%G5124><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> the evil <S%G4190><s%> spirit <S%G4151><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%>, Jesus <S%G2424><s%> I know <S%G1097><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> I know <S%G1987><s%>; but <S%G1161><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> are <S%G2075><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%>?

And <S%G2532><s%> the man <S%G444><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> the evil <S%G4190><s%> spirit <S%G4151><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> leaped <S%G2177><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> overcame <S%G2634><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, and prevailed <S%G2480><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, so <S%G5620><s%> that they fled <S%G1628><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> house <S%G3624><s%> naked <S%G1131><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> wounded <S%G5135><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> was <S%G1096><s%> known <S%G1110><s%> to all <S%G3956><s%> the Jews <S%G2453><s%> and <S%G5037><s%> Greeks <S%G1672><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> dwelling <S%G2730><s%> at Ephesus <S%G2181><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> fear <S%G5401><s%> fell <S%G1968><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> them <S%G846><s%> all <S%G3956><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the name <S%G3686><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> was magnified <S%G3170><s%>.
And <S%G5037><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> that believed <S%G4100><s%> came <S%G2064><s%>, and confessed <S%G1843><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> shewed <S%G312><s%> their <S%G846><s%> deeds <S%G4234><s%>.

Many <S%G2425><s%> of them also <S%G1161><s%> which used <S%G4238><s%> curious arts <S%G4021><s%> brought <S%G4851><s%> their books <S%G976><s%> together <S%G4851><s%>, and burned them <S%G2618><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> men: and <S%G2532><s%> they counted <S%G4860><s%> the price <S%G5092><s%> of them <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> found <S%G2147><s%> it fifty <S%G4002><s%> thousand <S%G3461><s%> pieces of silver <S%G694><s%>.
So <S%G3779><s%> mightily <S%G2596><s%> <S%G2904><s%> grew <S%G837><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of God <S%G2962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> prevailed <S%G2480><s%>.

¶ After <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5613><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> were ended <S%G4137><s%>, Paul <S%G3972><s%> purposed <S%G5087><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the spirit <S%G4151><s%>, when he had passed through <S%G1330><s%> Macedonia <S%G3109><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Achaia <S%G882><s%>, to go <S%G4198><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2419><s%>, saying <S%G2036><s%>, After <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3326><s%> I <S%G3165><s%> have been <S%G1096><s%> there <S%G1563><s%>, I <S%G3165><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> see <S%G1492><s%> Rome <S%G4516><s%>.

So <S%G1161><s%> he sent <S%G649><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Macedonia <S%G3109><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> of them that ministered <S%G1247><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Timotheus <S%G5095><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Erastus <S%G2037><s%>; but he himself <S%G846><s%> stayed <S%G1907><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> Asia <S%G773><s%> for a season <S%G5550><s%>.
And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2596><s%> the same <S%G1565><s%> time <S%G2540><s%> there arose <S%G1096><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> small <S%G3641><s%> stir <S%G5017><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> that way <S%G3598><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> a certain <S%G5100><s%> man named <S%G3686><s%> Demetrius <S%G1216><s%>, a silversmith <S%G695><s%>, which made <S%G4160><s%> silver <S%G693><s%> shrines <S%G3485><s%> for Diana <S%G735><s%>, brought <S%G3930><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> small <S%G3641><s%> gain <S%G2039><s%> unto the craftsmen <S%G5079><s%>;

Whom <S%G3739><s%> he called together <S%G4867><s%> with the workmen <S%G2040><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> like occupation <S%G5108><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%>, Sirs <S%G435><s%>, ye know <S%G1987><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> by <S%G1537><s%> this <S%G5026><s%> craft <S%G2039><s%> we have <S%G2076><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> wealth <S%G2142><s%>.

Moreover <S%G2532><s%> ye see <S%G2334><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> hear <S%G191><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> alone <S%G3440><s%> at Ephesus <S%G2181><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> almost <S%G4975><s%> throughout all <S%G3956><s%> Asia <S%G773><s%>, this <S%G3778><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> hath persuaded <S%G3982><s%> and turned away <S%G3179><s%> much <S%G2425><s%> people <S%G3793><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> they be <S%G1526><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> gods <S%G2316><s%>, which <S%G3588><s%> are made <S%G1096><s%> with <S%G1223><s%> hands <S%G5495><s%>:

So <S%G1161><s%> that not <S%G3756><s%> only <S%G3440><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> our <S%G2254><s%> craft <S%G3313><s%> is in danger <S%G2793><s%> to be set <S%G2064><s%> at <S%G1519><s%> nought <S%G557><s%>; but <S%G235><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> that the temple <S%G2411><s%> of the great <S%G3173><s%> goddess <S%G2299><s%> Diana <S%G735><s%> should be despised <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3762><s%> <S%G3049><s%>, and <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2532><s%> her <S%G846><s%> magnificence <S%G3168><s%> should <S%G3195><s%> be destroyed <S%G2507><s%>, whom <S%G3739><s%> all <S%G3650><s%> Asia <S%G773><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the world <S%G3625><s%> worshippeth <S%G4576><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> when they heard <S%G191><s%> these sayings, they were <S%G1096><s%> full <S%G4134><s%> of wrath <S%G2372><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> cried out <S%G2896><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, Great <S%G3173><s%> is Diana <S%G735><s%> of the Ephesians <S%G2180><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the whole <S%G3650><s%> city <S%G4172><s%> was filled <S%G4130><s%> with confusion <S%G4799><s%>: and <S%G5037><s%> having caught <S%G4884><s%> Gaius <S%G1050><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Aristarchus <S%G708><s%>, men of Macedonia <S%G3110><s%>, Paul's <S%G3972><s%> companions in travel <S%G4898><s%>, they rushed <S%G3729><s%> with one accord <S%G3661><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the theatre <S%G2302><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G1014><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> would <S%G1014><s%> have entered <S%G1525><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> unto the people <S%G1218><s%>, the disciples <S%G3101><s%> suffered <S%G1439><s%> him <S%G846><s%> not <S%G3756><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2532><s%> certain <S%G5100><s%> of the chief of Asia <S%G775><s%>, which were <S%G5607><s%> his <S%G846><s%> friends <S%G5384><s%>, sent <S%G3992><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, desiring <S%G3870><s%> him that he would <S%G1325><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> adventure <S%G1325><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the theatre <S%G2302><s%>.

Some <S%G243><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> <S%G3303><s%> cried <S%G2896><s%> one thing <S%G5100><s%>, and some another <S%G243><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> the assembly <S%G1577><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> confused <S%G4797><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> the more part <S%G4119><s%> knew <S%G1492><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> wherefore <S%G5101><s%> <S%G1752><s%> they were come together <S%G4905><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> they drew <S%G4264><s%> Alexander <S%G223><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> the multitude <S%G3793><s%>, the Jews <S%G2453><s%> putting <S%G4261><s%> him <S%G846><s%> forward <S%G4261><s%> <S%G4261><s%>. And <S%G1161><s%> Alexander <S%G223><s%> beckoned <S%G2678><s%> with the hand <S%G5495><s%>, and would <S%G2309><s%> have made his defence <S%G626><s%> unto the people <S%G1218><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> when they knew <S%G1921><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> he was <S%G2076><s%> a Jew <S%G2453><s%>, all <S%G3956><s%> <S%G1096><s%> with <S%G1537><s%> one <S%G3391><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%> about <S%G5613><s%> the space <S%G1909><s%> of two <S%G1417><s%> hours <S%G5610><s%> cried out <S%G2896><s%>, Great <S%G3173><s%> is Diana <S%G735><s%> of the Ephesians <S%G2180><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> when the townclerk <S%G1122><s%> had appeased <S%G2687><s%> the people <S%G3793><s%>, he said <S%G5346><s%>, Ye men <S%G435><s%> of Ephesus <S%G2180><s%>, what <S%G5101><s%> <S%G1063><s%> man <S%G444><s%> is there <S%G2076><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> knoweth <S%G1097><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> how that the city <S%G4172><s%> of the Ephesians <S%G2180><s%> is <S%G5607><s%> a worshipper <S%G3511><s%> of the great <S%G3173><s%> goddess <S%G2299><s%> Diana <S%G735><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> of the image which fell down from Jupiter <S%G1356><s%>?

Seeing <S%G5607><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> that these things <S%G5130><s%> cannot be spoken against <S%G368><s%>, ye <S%G5209><s%> ought <S%G1163><s%> <S%G2076><s%> to be <S%G5225><s%> quiet <S%G2687><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> to do <S%G4238><s%> nothing <S%G3367><s%> rashly <S%G4312><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> ye have brought hither <S%G71><s%> these <S%G5128><s%> men <S%G435><s%>, which are neither <S%G3777><s%> robbers of churches <S%G2417><s%>, nor yet <S%G3777><s%> blasphemers <S%G987><s%> of your <S%G5216><s%> goddess <S%G2299><s%>.

Wherefore <S%G3303><s%> <S%G3767><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> Demetrius <S%G1216><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the craftsmen <S%G5079><s%> which are with <S%G4862><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, have <S%G2192><s%> a matter <S%G3056><s%> against <S%G4314><s%> any man <S%G5100><s%>, the law <S%G60><s%> is open <S%G71><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> there are <S%G1526><s%> deputies <S%G446><s%>: let them implead <S%G1458><s%> one another <S%G240><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> ye inquire <S%G1934><s%> any thing <S%G5100><s%> concerning <S%G4012><s%> other matters <S%G2087><s%>, it shall be determined <S%G1956><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> a lawful <S%G1772><s%> assembly <S%G1577><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G2532><s%> we are in danger <S%G2793><s%> to be called in question <S%G1458><s%> for <S%G4012><s%> this day's <S%G4594><s%> uproar <S%G4714><s%>, there being <S%G5225><s%> no <S%G3367><s%> cause <S%G158><s%> whereby <S%G4012><s%> <S%G3739><s%> we may <S%G1410><s%> give <S%G591><s%> an account <S%G3056><s%> of this <S%G5026><s%> concourse <S%G4963><s%>.
And <S%G2532><s%> when he had <S%G2036><s%> thus <S%G5023><s%> spoken <S%G2036><s%>, he dismissed <S%G630><s%> the assembly <S%G1577><s%>.
